subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: In a divided vote, the Union ousted its president, Pat McQuaid, whose tenure was marred by doping scandals, and elected the British cycling official Brian Cookson in his place.
snippet: In a divided vote, the Union ousted its president, Pat McQuaid, whose tenure was marred by doping scandals, and elected the British cycling official Brian Cookson in his place.
